My boy loves this, top upload as always, many many thanks. Don't cheap out on discs, always use Verbatim DL, never, ever have any probs!!!

Well, all I have to say is, that for me, this sucks. Burning went a-okay, I put it into my machine and it says play game, with no screen for it, just blank play game, I press A and I get unreadable disc error, telling me about cleaing it. I don't really have a problem with the way I burn games and discs, so I dunno what's the problem

Strange is, I patched it down to wave 2, but I also did the same with WWE All Stars, Mortal Kombat and Lego Pirates of the Carribean and all of these worked without a problem. So, what I don't get is why is this game "special" in this way?

Yeah, same here.  Mortal Kombat and Lego Pirates works fine, as does Michael Jackson.  Had the same disc read error with Lego Star Wars 3 and just now LA Noire.

Think these must be the new wave.  Will have a look on the forums later.
I don't think it's a new wave, especially, that Lego Pirates was released later than Lego SW 3. But that's a good idea, I will look around on the net aswell. Maybe someone has a solution
I burned this game (along with others that worked just fine to play) but the xbox only recognize it as a dvd-disc, and I cant play the game. Anyone who knows what wrong?
Well, for me, it was something else, but I think there are more problems with this game, than it should have
